extendedInfo.description: ***** Thanks to all the players who have already fallen in love with Quell, Quell Reflect, and Quell Memento *****Quell Reflect is an enchanting game of logic which has taken the puzzle world by storm. Donât take our word for it! Read our user reviews (thanks guys!), and see for yourself!    "Quell. Is. Perfect" - No Dpad    "Woozily hypnotic" â Eurogamer    "Gaming App of the Day" â Kotaku    "Beautifully relaxing" â AppSpy    "Calming zen-like atmosphere" â Gamezebo    "Absolute joy to play" - Pocket Full of Apps    "Seems to lower blood pressure instead of raising it" â BestKidsApps* Over 80 levels of cunningly crafted puzzles â requires lateral thinking!* Hidden jewels on every level!* Perfectly balanced difficulty curve â soothing, not frustrating!* Custom soundtrack by top composer Steven Cravis â Calming music helps the brain!* Localized for English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Polish, Portuguese, Chinese, Korean, Taiwanese, and Japanese.* Quell is now MOGA Enhanced! Available at major retailers, carrier stores and online at http://www.MOGAanywhere.com* Also supports Xperia Play, and Nyko controllers* Leaderboards and Achievements, powered by Google Play Services* Cloud saves (when logged into Google in-game)Fall in love with Quell Reflect today...

reviews.comment: I play this to relax at night,  and to get me thinking in the morning. Its a good way to get the cogs moving quietly.
reviews.author: Mad MadamMim

reviews.title: Love it!!
reviews.comment: I have all 3 Quell games. Really make you think!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: A  very neat and innovative game. I have played just some levels and would be willing to buy the next level/game after completing all levels.
reviews.author: Balasubramanya Sharma

reviews.comment: Excellent, addictive, most are easy to complete though they get trickier, to do all perfectly? Hmmm, working on some!
reviews.author: Tim Day

reviews.title: Deceptively simple. A real thinker!
reviews.comment: The tutorial and the first several levels are simple enough for you to get the idea of how to play, and learn the basic moves. As you progress, the levels become more challenging. Applies logic, which can be frustrating at times, but once you start playing, you just can\'t stop! Great little game, never boring.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: What a great game - no pressure, no manic swiping, just pure puzzling brain work. Exactly the sort of game I love. Trying to complete every level in the minimum moves is all the challenge I need at my advanced age :)
reviews.author: Lynn Gibson

reviews.title: Zen
reviews.comment: Complete tranquility! Zen Mode! This is the ultimate game to relax yet keep your brain active!
reviews.author: Joel Edwards

reviews.comment: Very challenging and addictive game....DEFINITELY A \"MUST\" TRY!
reviews.author: edward malgapo

reviews.title: Excellent game.
reviews.comment: Very relaxing. Makes you think.
reviews.author: Michele Hogan

reviews.comment: Love all the Quell games.
reviews.author: Mike Hurt

reviews.comment: Great puzzles. A lot of fun.
reviews.author: Brendan Ward

reviews.title: Very relaxing puzzle!
reviews.comment: I have played the two generous free versions of this game and am enjoying this version even more!  A relaxing diversion.  Keep up the good work!
reviews.author: Daniel Brent

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Love the relaxation i get
reviews.author: Wendy S

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: Addictive time wasting
reviews.author: colin walker

reviews.title: Very creative and relaxing
reviews.comment: This game is an excellent sequel to quell.  Ive played this game to relax and challenge myself.  Five stars!
reviews.author: Brian Haraida

reviews.title: Calming fun
reviews.comment: What a beautiful game. The art and creativity might be above and beyond most users. Great game.
reviews.author: Doug Nielsen

reviews.title: Weeeeeee
reviews.comment: Fun
reviews.author: Nicholas Marsh

reviews.title: Wonderful!
reviews.comment: Love this game..wish there were more levels
reviews.author: Nicole Leonard

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: This game was great I played it all the way through it was a lot of fun
reviews.author: Eric Holey

reviews.title: Peaceful, beautiful
reviews.comment: Quell is a game that is smart, lovely to look at, listen to, play.
reviews.author: Alicson K
